name: sidan-csl-rs
description: (De)serialization functions for the Cardano blockchain along with related utility functions

scripts.core:build-nodejs: (rimraf ./packages/sidan-csl-rs/pkg && cd packages/sidan-csl-rs; wasm-pack build --target=nodejs; cd ..; npm run js:ts-json-gen; cd packages/sidan-csl-rs; wasm-pack pack) && npm run js:flowgen
scripts.core:build-browser: (rimraf ./packages/sidan-csl-rs/pkg && cd packages/sidan-csl-rs; wasm-pack build --target=browser; cd ..; npm run js:ts-json-gen; cd packages/sidan-csl-rs; wasm-pack pack) && npm run js:flowgen
scripts.core:build-web: (rimraf ./packages/sidan-csl-rs/pkg && cd packages/sidan-csl-rs; wasm-pack build --target=web; cd ..; npm run js:ts-json-gen; cd packages/sidan-csl-rs; wasm-pack pack) && npm run js:flowgen
scripts.core:build-asm: (rimraf ./packages/sidan-csl-rs/pkg && cd packages/sidan-csl-rs; wasm-pack build --target=browser; cd ..; npm run js:ts-json-gen; cd packages/sidan-csl-rs; wasm-pack pack) && npm run asm:build && npm run js:flowgen
scripts.js:prepublish: npm run core:test && rimraf ./publish && cp -r ./packages/sidan-csl-rs/pkg ./publish && cp README.md publish/ && cp LICENSE publish/
scripts.js:publish-nodejs: npm run core:build-nodejs && npm run js:prepublish && node ./scripts/publish-helper -nodejs && cd publish && npm publish --access public
scripts.js:publish-browser: npm run core:build-browser && npm run js:prepublish && node ./scripts/publish-helper -browser && cd publish && npm publish --access public
scripts.js:publish-asm: npm run core:build-asm && npm run js:prepublish && node ./scripts/publish-helper -asmjs && cd publish && npm publish --access public
scripts.js:ts-json-gen: cd packages/sidan-csl-rs/json-gen && cargo +stable run && cd ../.. && node ./scripts/run-json2ts.js && node ./scripts/json-ts-types.js
scripts.rust:doc-clear: rm -rf ./docs && mkdir docs && echo '<meta http-equiv="refresh" content="0; url=whisky">' > docs/index.html
scripts.rust:doc: npm run rust:doc-clear && RUSTDOCFLAGS="--cfg docsrs" cargo doc --workspace --manifest-path packages/Cargo.toml --no-deps && cp -r ./packages/target/doc/* ./docs

hooks.pre-commit: npm run core:test && npm run rust:test

author: SIDAN Lab
